content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=10.5, y=10.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=10.5, y=10.5), boiler(position x=-6.0, y=24.5) and offshore pump (position x=-9.5, y=24.5)

### Iron ore mine at position(x=-15.0, y=-50.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=-15.0, y=-50.0) and a chest at position(x=-16.5, y=-49.5)

### Iron plate factory at position(x=40.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Furnace (position x=40.0, y=-82.0) 
-  Furnace (position x=45.0, y=-83.0) 
-  Furnace (position x=42.0, y=-81.0) 
-  Furnace (position x=45.0, y=-80.0) 
-  Furnace (position x=40.0, y=-79.0) 
-  Chests at positions (x=40.5, y=-80.5), (x=43.5, y=-81.5), (x=43.5, y=-82.5)

### Lab at unknown position
Consists of lab with input automation-science-pack

### Inserter system at position(x=3.5, y=0.5)
Consists of burner inserter (position x=3.5, y=0.5), chest at position(x=2.5, y=0.5) and small electric pole at position(x=2.5, y=1.5)

### Inserter system at position(x=0.5, y=3.5)
Consists of burner inserter (position x=0.5, y=3.5) and chest at position(x=0.5, y=2.5)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner entities but being out of fuel
-  Make sure to provide fuel to burner entities before using them
### Errors when using furnaces but having no ingredients to smelt
-  Ensure furnaces have the necessary ingredients to smelt before using them
### Errors when using steam engine but having no input liquid
-  Ensure steam engine has the necessary input liquid before using it
### Errors when using offshore pump but having no fluid system connection
-  Ensure offshore pump is connected to a fluid system before using it
### Errors when using pipe groups but having no fluid
-  Ensure pipe groups have the necessary fluid before using them
### Errors when using electricity groups but having no voltage
-  Ensure electricity groups have the necessary voltage before using them
